summary: This is an email from attorney Brad Edwards to an unspecified recipient (likely a prosecutor or court official) regarding a trial date order and discussing potential next steps, including travel and testimony parameters for a female witness.

persons.name: Brad Edwards

persons.name: Brittany Henderson

events.title: Trial Date Order Issued
events.description: An order regarding a trial date was issued, prompting discussion about next steps and witness testimony.

keyFacts: An order regarding a trial date was issued on or before November 20, 2021.
Attorney Brad Edwards is discussing next steps with an unspecified recipient, potentially regarding the Epstein case.
The email discusses the potential need for a female witness to travel and the parameters of her testimony.
